Cyclonic Strikeplate.name: Cyclonic Strikeplate
part_effect: Tempest Form duration increased by 10 seconds. When Tempest Form has less than 10 seconds remaining, deal +15% damage.

Echo Bracedriver.name: Echo Bracedriver
part_effect: Critical strikes increase the damage dealt by Karma Breaker's damage over time by 5% until the debuff ends or is refreshed.

Inertial Fistguard.name: Inertial Fistguard
part_effect: Surge deals +25% damage. After surging, gain +5% movespeed for 8 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.

Adamant Bolt.name: Adamant Bolt
part_effect: Unleash energy in a focused blast, dealing 900 damage to the first enemy hit. Deals up to +100% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.

Titan's Crash.name: Titan's Crash
part_effect: Unleash energy forward in a pressure wave, dealing 500 damage to the closest target and 166 damage to nearby target. Deals up to +100% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.

Furious Axecore.name: Furious Axecore
part_effect: Perfectly charged attacks grants +15 meter on hit, but no longer grant resolve.

Lightweight Haft.name: Lightweight Haft
part_effect: Movespeed while charging Horizontal Attacks is now increased instead of decreased and costs no stamina to maintain.

Overcharged Cylinder.name: Overcharged Cylinder
part_effect: Determination can now stack up to 4 times.

Railsplitter's Canteen.name: Railsplitter's Canteen
part_effect: Tonics consumed while your axe is thrown have +50% effectiveness.

Volatile Axecore.name: Volatile Axecore
part_effect: Charging attack deals aoe damage to nearby enemies at each charge level.

Flight of Ruin.name: Flight of Ruin
part_effect: Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies while thrown. Reactivate to call the axe and perform a powerful overhand swing that can generate determination.

Grim Onslaught.name: Grim Onslaught
part_effect: Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path before landing a distance away. Hitting a Behemoth can generate Resolve and will bounce the axe back towards the user.

Relentless Onslaught.name: Relentless Onslaught
part_effect: Hurl the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path. Catch the axe to throw it again up to 2 more times in the next 5 seconds, dealing 500/600/1000 damage (further increased by determination). Does not build meter.

Demolition Blades.name: Demolition Blades
part_effect: After using a special, deal +100% damage to objects created by Behemoths for 6 seconds.

Hurricane Blades.name: Hurricane Blades
part_effect: Using Blade Spin grants stacking on-next hit damage that is consumed when using other attacks.

Lightweight Chain.name: Lightweight Chain
part_effect: Dashing towards a Behemoth reduces stamina cost of the dash by 50%.

Momentum Blades.name: Momentum Blades
part_effect: After using a special, your next special use within 4 seconds is free.

Serrated Blades.name: Serrated Blades
part_effect: Bladed attacks have a chance to cause your next swinging blades to be a critical strike.

Cruel Riftstrike.name: Cruel Riftstrike
part_effect: Use to teleport forward, damaging enemies if present. Can teleport through Behemoths.

Insatiable Dance.name: Insatiable Dance
part_effect: From afar: Pull to targets and grant a stack of Insatiable Dance. While close: Push off targets, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a followup. Primary followup grants a stack of Insatiable Dance. Secondary followup expends stacks and creates a 50 health healing orb per stack.

Reaper's Dance.name: Reaper's Dance
part_effect: From afar: Pull to targets and grant a stack of Reaper's Dance. While close: Push off targets, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a followup. Primary followup grants a stack of Reaper's Dance. Secondary followup expends stacks to deal +40% damage per stack.

Antique Clip.name: Antique Clip
part_effect: Ammo decreased to 2, but bonus from aethercharged ammo is increased by 300%.

Extended Clip.name: Extended Clip
part_effect: Ammo increased to 6.

Impulse Crown.name: Impulse Crown
part_effect: Aerial Strike grants increased damage dealt for 10 seconds. Bonus is doubled if a Behemoth's head is struck.

Turbine Trigger.name: Turbine Trigger
part_effect: Priming attacks increases attack speed by 10% until the combo ends. Stacks.

Weighted Crown.name: Weighted Crown
part_effect: Stagger damage is no longer halved when attacking Behemoth legs.

Concussive Salvo.name: Concussive Salvo
part_effect: Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, damage and interrupting behemoths.

Ironheart Landbreaker.name: Ironheart Landbreaker
part_effect: Hold to load ammo into the hammer. Release to create an aether vent that buffs players who step over it, granting them +40% damage reduction and up to 155 healing over 30 seconds when aethercharged.

Mighty Landbreaker.name: Mighty Landbreaker
part_effect: Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, creating an aether vent that buffs players.

part_effect: Shots and abilities deal frost damage.

part_effect: Shots and abilities deal radiant damage.

Empowered: Deals greatly increased damage and pushes the slayer backwards.

Marksman Chamber.name: Marksman Chamber
Marksman Chamber.description: The Marksman Chamber is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: Fires a shot in a line, dealing 250 damage to the first Behemoth hit. If a part is struck, that part takes 40% more damage from Shots for 10 seconds.
Empowered: Damage bonus increased to 80%, and 25% to all allies.

Salvo Chamber.name: Salvo Chamber
Salvo Chamber.description: The Salvo Chamber is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: Fires an explosive missile in a line, dealing 400 damage in an area upon impact.
Empowered: Fires 3 missiles in a spread.

Captain's Grip.name: Captain's Grip
Captain's Grip.description: The Captain's Grip is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: Launches a collectible buff a short distance, granting 15% increased attack speed for 15 seconds when collected.
Empowered: Grants the same buff to all Slayers.

Saboteur's Grip.name: Saboteur's Grip
Saboteur's Grip.description: The Saboteur's Grip is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: Launches an explosive mine that deals 400 damage. Mine charges after a short period, increasing damage to 700.
Empowered: Deals 900 damage when charged and can interrupt Behemoths.

Capacitive Magazine.name: Capacitive Magazine
part_effect: Using an ability returns 4 ammo to the magazine.

Demolition Sights.name: Demolition Sights
part_effect: While empowered, deal +50% damage to objects created by Behemoths.

Extraction Catalyst.name: Extraction Catalyst
part_effect: Reduce both ability cooldowns by 2 seconds when dodging through Behemoth attacks.

Lightweight Frame.name: Lightweight Frame
part_effect: Gain 20% increased movespeed when at 6 or less ammo.

Lucky Magazine.name: Lucky Magazine
part_effect: Grants 2% critical strike chance for each round missing from the magazine.

Precision Sights.name: Precision Sights
part_effect: Deal 5 increased damage when attacking the same part multiple times. Stacks up to 8 times.

Scoped Sights.name: Scoped Sights
part_effect: Increases damage falloff range by 25%

Tactician's Magazine.name: Tactician's Magazine
part_effect: Empowered Reloading at exactly 0 ammo decreases the cooldown of both abilities by 4 seconds.

Brilliant Prism.name: Brilliant Prism
Brilliant Prism.description: The Brilliant Prism is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: Once charged, your next attack will deal 550 bonus radiant damage. Charge rate increases with current health.

Eclipse Prism.name: Eclipse Prism
Eclipse Prism.description: The Eclipse Prism is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: Dealing damage has a chance (based on damage dealt) to generate a shadow orb that increases damage dealt by 2.25% for 5 seconds. If 5 or more orbs are present, the bonus doubles.

Firestorm Prism.name: Firestorm Prism
Firestorm Prism.description: The Firestorm Prism is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: After spending 150 stamina, next attack emits a cone of flame that deals +200 blaze damage to each unique target within the cone.

Glacial Prism.name: Glacial Prism
Glacial Prism.description: The Glacial Prism is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: Evading drops 6 Ice Mines on a 30 second cooldown.

Searing Prism.name: Searing Prism
Searing Prism.description: The Searing Prism is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: The tenth hit in quick succession deals 225 bonus damage and major blaze damage

Snowdrift Prism.name: Snowdrift Prism
Snowdrift Prism.description: The Snowdrift Prism is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: The last 4 shots in your magazine generate a Frost Sprite that cause your next attack to deal 60 bonus damage and minor frost damage. Max 4 Sprites.

Stoneheart Prism.name: Stoneheart Prism
Stoneheart Prism.description: The Stoneheart Prism is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
part_effect: Dealing damage has a chance (based on damage dealt) to grant a stacking, refreshing 40 health shield that lasts for 12s.

Adhesive Hilt.name: Adhesive Hilt
part_effect: Become unstaggerable while in special.

Momentum Pommel.name: Momentum Pommel
part_effect: Triple Elements combo finisher can be performed twice, dealing +100 damage on the 2nd use.

Perpetual Bladecore.name: Perpetual Bladecore
part_effect: Dealing damage while in special generates a small amount of special meter

Reactive Hilt.name: Reactive Hilt
part_effect: Dodge attacks always critically strike.

Whistling Blade.name: Whistling Blade
part_effect: Reduces the stamina cost of Repeating Elements by 25% and each Repeating Elements attack grants +5% attack speed (up to 30%) until the combo is ended.

Ardent Cyclone.name: Ardent Cyclone
part_effect: Activate at full meter to start to spin, damaging nearby enemies for the duration. Reactive to slash in a direction, damaging enemies.

Avenging Overdrive.name: Avenging Overdrive
part_effect: Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, increasing attack speed and causing attacks to deal AoE damage. Reactivate to parry and riposte a behemoth attack.

Valiant Overdrive.name: Valiant Overdrive
part_effect: Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, increasing attack speed and causing attacks to deal aoe damage. Reactivate to dash in a direction (incurs a short cooldown).

Balanced Spearhead.name: Balanced Spearhead
part_effect: Increases damage dealt by 3% each time Piercing and Harvesting attacks are alternated. Resets upon combo end.

Barbed Spearhead.name: Barbed Spearhead
part_effect: After a dodge piercing attack, gain +50% wound damage for 8 seconds.

Executioner's Spearhead.name: Executioner's Spearhead
part_effect: Each time the Behemoth is wounded, gain +6% damage

Lightweight Shaft.name: Lightweight Shaft
part_effect: Pike charge attack no longer costs stamina and always critically strikes.

Munitions Amplifier.name: Munitions Amplifier
part_effect: Stored ammo quality increases slowly over time, up to max.

Concussive Payload.name: Concussive Payload
part_effect: Use to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to fire a missile that damages and can interrupt Behemoths.

Reckless Leap.name: Reckless Leap
part_effect: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo and perform a flying lunge attack that deals up to 1200 damage based on distance and ammo quality.

Savage Wellspring.name: Savage Wellspring
part_effect: Use to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to create an aura that buffs nearby allies with critical strike chance. Duration increases with ammo quality.
